#summary C/C++ extensions to IDL

=== Sub Directories ===
    * [SrcDLM DLM]
    * [SrcIDLStruct IDLStruct] -- A C++ class that wrapps an IDL structure and gives an interface to the elements and tags.
    * [SrcAtlas atlas] -- Wrappers for Robert Lupton's atlas reader code.
    * [SrcFileio fileio] -- C++ extensions for efficient reading and writing of binary and ascii files.
    * [SrcGauleg gauleg] -- C extension for calculating gauss-legendre integration weights and abscissa.
    * [SrcHtmIndexIDL htmIndexIDL] -- C++ extension for performing hierarchical trianglar mesh indicex calculation, searches, and matches. These are wrappers around the basic library of Peter Kunszt.
    * [SrcPgsql pgsql] -- C extension for interfacing with a postgres database. Returns the results in an IDL structure.
    * [SrcSdsspixIDL sdsspixIDL] -- C extension wrapping Ryan Scranton's sdsspix routines.
    * [SrcSphpoly_masks sphpoly_masks] -- C extension wrapping Andreas Berlind's spherical polygon search code.
    * [SrcTotal_int total_int] -- C extension to total an array as integers. Like built in total(), but works on integers without converting to float. IDL versions greater than 6 also support total(x, /int)
